channel.title: My New Project! [I Suck At Coding] Please tell me what you think!
channel.description:
[b]Warning: I'm saying this because of the new rule, I did use a template for the header![/b] Hey guys, i'm working on a new project! :)
Constructive Criticism Welcome (I know ill get alot of it :|)
[url=http://flashcod.liquidhost.biz]http://flashcod.liquidhost.biz[/url] (If i get some members ill probally get a domain, its my old hosting companys reseller, my domain ran out so its just like this :D)
Its called isuckatcoding i'm really hoping it will be a community full of webmasters / coders where we help eachother and learn from eachother and show our work etc :rolleyes: but there are so many already so i doubt ill ever get more than 10 members on the forums :P
Can you guys tell me any way i could improve it or anything :D
At the same time i am learning (Started Yesterday) php and i made the contact form myself ;) I know its real simple but i am proud of myself :o
Thank YOU For reading !

item.title: My New Project! [I Suck At Coding] Please tell me what you think!
item.dc:creator: @Daed Daed
item.description:
@Daed wrote:

I don’t like the word Staff much i prefer members. members of i suck at coding, whats wrong with that? ill change the colour theme of the forum and im how to allign php includes sorry, i can’t even get my cutenews include working ^^

Read full topic
item.source: My New Project! [I Suck At Coding] Please tell me what you think!

item.title: My New Project! [I Suck At Coding] Please tell me what you think!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Font page

  • Whats with the “Time left:[non moving number]” thing? Shouldn’t is be counting down?
  • The page isn’t centered(As stated before).

Forums

  • Layout is epic ew. Shouldn’t it flow with the rest of the website in some way?

Members pg.

  • Tbh pretty pointless if you want the site to become big, should just be Staff?

Read full topic
item.source: My New Project! [I Suck At Coding] Please tell me what you think!

item.title: My New Project! [I Suck At Coding] Please tell me what you think!

item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

id suggest using php to do inludes if you want to make it dynamic becuase people hate having to scroll in the middle of the page…

Read full topic

item.title: My New Project! [I Suck At Coding] Please tell me what you think!
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

There are a few things you can improve.

first things first, never use iframes, no one likes them

secondly, your frame isnt in the center like your banner.

item.description:
@Daed wrote:

Warning: I’m saying this because of the new rule, I did use a template for the header!
Hey guys, i’m working on a new project!

Constructive Criticism Welcome (I know ill get alot of it :|)

http://flashcod.liquidhost.biz (If i get some members ill probally get a domain, its my old hosting companys reseller, my domain ran out so its just like this :D)

Its called isuckatcoding i’m really hoping it will be a community full of webmasters / coders where we help eachother and learn from eachother and show our work etc :rolleyes: but there are so many already so i doubt ill ever get more than 10 members on the forums

Can you guys tell me any way i could improve it or anything

At the same time i am learning (Started Yesterday) php and i made the contact form myself
I know its real simple but i am proud of myself :o
